string.value: #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says he'll tell you what the fairies like. Let's talk to him.

The fairies are very fond of the sound of Ocarina.



#b#@1012003:##k says he will make you an Ocarina if you bring back the following items.

#rTree Branch#k(a drop item from #rStumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100050000##k.)
#rEllinia Tree Barrel#k(a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)

Report back to #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1032101:##k in #bEllinia#k will welcome you if you give her the Ocarina. Let's go see her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,000 #Wbasic# #i4032481:# #t4032481:# #c4032481# 1 Able to proceed to 'Solomon's Bow' as next quest.

Yes, you've heard correctly. The fairies don't like to talk to strangers, especially humans, because they're very guarded. But what do you think you can entice them with? Food? Potion? Water? Don't you think they'd like Music?
Yes, yes, the fairies love music, especially if you play the Ocarina for them. I can make you one if you bring me the necessary materials. What do you say?
Then bring me 10 #rTree Branches#k by eliminating #rStumps#k, and 1 #rEllinia Tree Barrel#k by eliminating #rDark Stumps#k. I'll quickly make you one if you bring me those items.
You don't want to, that's fine with me.
You didn't even take notes, but you remembered everything I've asked you to collect.\n\n

It doesn't look too fancy, but it'll make a clear, beautiful sound.
The fairies will love it.

As #b#p9201118##k may have suggested, go see #b#p1032101##k in #bEllinia#k. And don't forget to play the Ocarina! Haha!
Bring me 10 #rTree Branches#k and 1 #rEllinia Tree Barrel#k.
